Job Title: Staff Accountant (Direct Hire) (A1845)

Location: Painesville, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Our Client in Painesville, OH immediately needsa Staff Accountant#COH

Already Registered with Express Employment?No need to apply. Text [order number] to (440) 571-5185. Pay is$56,652.00 - $76,224.00 Salary BOEThis is a 1st Shift PositionThis job is in Painesville, OHMost Benefits Available Immediately (See Below)Never a Fee to the Applicant Five Ways to Apply: Apply here online.Call (440) 571-5185 to schedule an interview.Text us at (440) 571-5185.Stop into7959 Reynolds RoadM-F between 9 AM and 3:30 PM.Download the ExpressJobs app fromGoogle Playor theApple Store Qualifications 0 – 2 years of accounting experience in a manufacturing environmentBachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance requiredKnowledge of ERP and accounting systemsHighly proficient in Microsoft Office applications, especially ExcelThorough knowledge of accounts payable and general accounting practicesFamiliarity with US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (US GAAP) and SOX controlsStrong written and verbal communication skillsAttention to detail, proven analytical and problem-solving abilities PositionFunctions Own all activities related to the accounts payable and drive continuous process improvementResponsible for daily customer invoicing and billingPerform 3-way match of PO’s, picklists, and invoicesCode and enter matched invoices into ERP systemPrepare weekly check runs, wires, etc.Assist with AR collections and cash applicationCreate and maintain databases on activity conducted on all accountsOwn prepaids, intercompany charges and accruals as a part of month-end close process (i.e., journal entries, account reconciliations, etc.)Support monthly and quarterly internal and external reporting cadenceSupport internal and external audit processes throughout the yearAd Hoc analysis and projects as needed

Express Benefits Available: Health InsuranceDentalVisionLife InsuranceDisability401(k) (Requires Waiting Period)Paid HolidaysReferral BonusesAttendance Incentives One interview will connect you to over 200 companies in theLake Countyarea when you work with Express. Our exclusive matching system helps you get the shift, location, and position you are most qualified for at the pay you deserve.

ChardonEastlakeMentorMiddlefieldNewburyPainesvillePerryWickliffeWilloughby PandoLogic. Keywords: Staff Accountant, Location: PAINESVILLE, OH - 44077

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Staff Accountant (Direct Hire)
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance
job_responsibilities: Own all activities related to accounts payable
Responsible for daily customer invoicing and billing
Perform 3-way match of PO’s, picklists, and invoices
Code and enter matched invoices into ERP system
Prepare weekly check runs, wires, etc.
Assist with AR collections and cash application
Create and maintain databases on activity conducted on all accounts
Own prepaids, intercompany charges and accruals as a part of month-end close process
Support monthly and quarterly internal and external reporting cadence
Support internal and external audit processes throughout the year
Ad Hoc analysis and projects as needed
